message: I propose dividing the money with an 60/40 split in favor of Alice. This could be seen as a fair distribution considering the risk of inflation.
I think 80/20 is a more reasonable split, considering the risk of inflation is still uncertain and I'm willing to take on more of it.
Considering the uncertainty around inflation, I propose a 50/50 split. This ensures both of us share the potential risk equally.
I think I can take on most of the risk, but I'm willing to offer you a small share to keep the game going.
